title: False Claims About Homeopathic Nosodes
cleaned_text: False Claims About Homeopathic NosodesOrganization: [Immunize Canada (IC)](/search?topic[]=212) Published: 2018 - What is homeopathy? - What is a nosode? - Can nosodes prevent diseases, like vaccines which have been safely proven to do so? - Why is it important to immunize yourself and your family with vaccines? - Are nosodes alternatives to vaccines for children and Ratings submitted by CANVax users for this resource are tallied to provide an average resource rating per category.
